title: Thousands forced to flee as Mount Nyiragongo volcano erupts in Congo
content:
1. Thousands forced to flee as Mount Nyiragongo volcano erupts in Congo  NBC News
  2. Volcano eruption appears to subside in the Democratic Republic of Congo but residents evacuate as a precaution  CNN
  3. Goma, Congo locals flee to neighbouring Rwanda following volcanic eruption  NTV Kenya
  4. Volcano erupts near Congolese city of Goma; residents flee  Associated Press
  5. Volcano erupts in eastern Congo, thousands flee Goma: Sophie Mokoena  SABC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: コンゴ共和国のニイラゴンゴ火山の噴火により、数千人が避難を余儀なくされました。
刚果尼拉贡戈火山爆发，数千人被迫逃亡
剛果尼拉貢戈火山爆發，數千人被迫逃亡
